Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the impact of food waste as the 3rd largest contributor of greenhouse gas emissions.
Lack enough support: The claim may lack enough support or evidence to establish food waste as the 3rd largest contributor of greenhouse gas emissions.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that food waste is directly comparable to countries in terms of greenhouse gas emissions, which may be a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations or factors contributing to greenhouse gas emissions that are not considered in the claim.
